description: Liverpool news: Champions League play-offs draw made
title: Champions League play-offs draw made
title_page: Liverpool news: Champions League play-offs draw made - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Champions League knockout phase play-off draw is complete.
Liverpool now know they will play either the winners of Brest v Paris St-Germain or Monaco v Benfica in the last 16, as they look to take another step closer to the final.
The play-off first legs will take place on 11 and 12 February, with the second legs on 18 and 19 February.
The Reds will then find out their last-16 opponents - and their route to the final - in the next Champions League draw on Friday, 21 February.
